title: Nursing Competency Enhancement: Diabetes Management Online Education Based on Escape Games

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Diabetes Concepts (Blood Glucose, Insulin, Complications, etc.)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three dietary/exercise management strategies for diabetic patients.
Learners can analyze blood glucose measurement data based on real-world cases and propose appropriate interventions.
Learners can apply management knowledge to solve over 80% of escape game missions through team-based collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
